mapper.sql: SUPPLIER_NO, ID, VALID, STATUS, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, SORT
mapper.select:
select
from IFT_SUPPLIER where VALID = 1 ORDER BY SORT ASC
mapper.insert: insert into IFT_SUPPLIER (SUPPLIER_NO, ID, VALID, STATUS, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, SORT) values (#{supplierNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{valid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sort,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into IFT_SUPPLIER
SUPPLIER_NO,
ID,
VALID,
STATUS,
CREATOR,
CREATE_TIME,
SORT,

mapper.update:
update IFT_SUPPLIER
ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
VALID = #{valid,jdbcType=TINYINT},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where SUPPLIER_NO = #{supplierNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update IFT_SUPPLIER set ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, VALID = #{valid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=BIGINT} where SUPPLIER_NO = #{supplierNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select MAX(SORT) from IFT_SUPPLIER where valid=1

select
from IFT_SUPPLIER where SUPPLIER_NO = #{supplierNo,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND VALID=1
